hero.headline: Accelerate Your AI Development with Precision Annotation
hero.subheadline: AnnotateIt is the professional vision annotation platform trusted by ML engineers, data scientists, and AI teams to create high-quality training datasets faster and more accurately.
hero.visualAlt: AnnotateIt main interface showing image annotation with bounding boxes and polygon tools

features.title: Powerful Features for Professional Annotation
features.subtitle: Everything you need to create high-quality training datasets for machine learning models

multipleAnnotationTypes.title: Multiple Annotation Types
multipleAnnotationTypes.description: Support for bounding boxes, polygons, and classification annotations to meet all your computer vision needs.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Create and manage annotation projects with customizable labels and organized workflows.

datasetImportExport.title: Dataset Import/Export
datasetImportExport.description: Import and export datasets in various formats for seamless integration with your ML pipeline.

preAnnotationAI.title: Pre-annotation AI Tools
preAnnotationAI.description: Automatic image labeling using advanced AI tools to accelerate your annotation workflow.

intuitiveInterface.title: Intuitive Interface
intuitiveInterface.description: User-friendly interface designed for efficiency and accuracy in annotation tasks.

advancedTools.title: Advanced Tools
advancedTools.description: Professional-grade tools for precise annotations and quality control.

cta.title: Ready to streamline your annotation workflow?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of data scientists and ML engineers who trust AnnotateIt for their projects.

benefits.title: Why Choose AnnotateIt?
benefits.subtitle: Trusted by data scientists and ML engineers worldwide for creating high-quality training datasets

saveTime.title: Save Time
saveTime.description: Reduce annotation time by up to 70% with automated labeling and intelligent tools.

improveAccuracy.title: Improve Accuracy
improveAccuracy.description: Professional-grade tools ensure precise annotations for better model performance.

scaleEfficiently.title: Scale Efficiently
scaleEfficiently.description: Handle large datasets with batch processing and automated workflows.

reduceCosts.title: Reduce Costs
reduceCosts.description: Lower annotation costs with efficient tools and reduced manual work.

fasterTimeToMarket.title: Faster Time-to-Market
fasterTimeToMarket.description: Accelerate your ML projects with streamlined annotation workflows and rapid dataset preparation.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: Keep your sensitive data secure with local processing and no cloud dependency requirements.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Enable seamless collaboration with project sharing, progress tracking, and quality control.

easyIntegration.title: Easy Integration
easyIntegration.description: Integrate seamlessly with your existing ML pipeline through multiple export formats.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Built-in validation tools ensure consistent, high-quality annotations across your team.

performanceOptimized.title: Performance Optimized
performanceOptimized.description: Handle large images and complex annotations without performance degradation.

items.quote: AnnotateIt has revolutionized our annotation workflow. We've reduced our dataset preparation time by 60% while improving annotation quality.
items.author: Dr. Sarah Chen

items.quote: The Pre-annotation AI Tools integration is a game-changer. It provides excellent starting points for our annotations, saving hours of manual work.
items.author: Michael Rodriguez

items.quote: Finally, an annotation tool that understands the needs of professional ML teams. The interface is intuitive and the features are comprehensive.
items.author: Lisa Wang

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Annotation Workflow?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who have already improved their ML projects with AnnotateIt

projectDashboard.title: Project Dashboard
projectDashboard.description: Manage all your annotation projects from a centralized dashboard with project overview and progress tracking.

boundingBoxAnnotation.title: Bounding Box Annotation
boundingBoxAnnotation.description: Precise bounding box annotation tools with real-time preview and label management.
boundingBoxAnnotation.alt: AnnotateIt annotation interface displaying an image with bounding box annotations, label selector, and annotation tools panel

objectDetectionSetup.title: Object Detection Setup
objectDetectionSetup.description: Easy project creation wizard for object detection tasks with customizable labels and settings.
objectDetectionSetup.alt: AnnotateIt project creation wizard for object detection showing form fields for project name, labels, and detection settings

classificationProject.title: Classification Project
classificationProject.description: Set up image classification projects with multi-class and multi-label support.
classificationProject.alt: AnnotateIt project setup interface for image classification with options for single-class and multi-class labeling

segmentationTools.title: Segmentation Tools
segmentationTools.description: Advanced segmentation annotation tools for pixel-perfect polygon annotations.
segmentationTools.alt: AnnotateIt segmentation project creation screen showing polygon annotation settings and segmentation tool options

datasetImport.title: Dataset Import
datasetImport.description: Import existing datasets in various formats to continue or enhance your annotations.
datasetImport.alt: AnnotateIt dataset import interface showing file upload options and supported format selection for existing datasets

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast
lightningFast.description: Optimized performance for handling large datasets and complex annotations without lag.

intuitiveDesign.title: Intuitive Design
intuitiveDesign.description: Clean, modern interface designed for productivity and ease of use across all skill levels.

professionalTools.title: Professional Tools
professionalTools.description: Advanced annotation tools with precision controls and quality assurance features.

responsiveLayout.title: Responsive Layout
responsiveLayout.description: Adaptive interface that works seamlessly across different screen sizes and devices.
